handlers

Class TextElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • handlers.TextElement

  • public class TextElement
extends java.lang.Object
    Single Text Element with configurable test, x position, y position, wrapping size (all relative to pane size), color and font.
    Author:
    Joel Fergusson

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextElement(java.lang.String text)
      Creates a text element with the default parameters: xpos = 0, ypos = 0, wrappingWidth = 0 (i.e.
      TextElement(java.lang.String text, double xpos, double ypos, double wrappingWidth, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, javafx.scene.text.Font font, double timeout)
      Creates a text element with the specified parameters.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void display(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane pane)
      Places the text on the pane passed to it.

      Sets the colour of the text

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextElement

        public TextElement(java.lang.String text,
           double xpos,
           double ypos,
           double wrappingWidth,
           javafx.scene.paint.Color color,
           javafx.scene.text.Font font,
           double timeout)
        Creates a text element with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        text - String to put on javafx pane
        xpos - x position of text (0-1 relative to pane width)
        ypos - y position of text (0-1 relative to pane height)
        wrappingWidth - wrapping width (0-1 relative to pane width, 0 disables wrapping.
        color - Color of text
        font - Font of text
        timeout - Time (seconds) for which the text should be displayed. 0 will display indefinitely.

      • TextElement

        public TextElement(java.lang.String text)
        Creates a text element with the default parameters: xpos = 0, ypos = 0, wrappingWidth = 0 (i.e. no wrapping), duration = 0 (i.e. no timeout).
        Parameters:
        text - String to put on javafx pane

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public void display(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane pane)
        Places the text on the pane passed to it.
        Parameters:
        pane - Pane to display the text on

      • setXpos

        public void setXpos(double xpos)
        Set the x position of the text.
        Parameters:
        xpos - X position in proportion of pixels from left of the pane.

      • setYpos

        public void setYpos(double ypos)
        Set the y position of the text.
        Parameters:
        ypos - Y position in proportion of pixels from top of the pane.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(double xpos,
               double ypos)
        Set the position of the text.
        Parameters:
        xpos - x position in proportion of pixels from top of the pane.
        ypos - y position in pixels from top of the pane.

      • setWrappingWidth

        public void setWrappingWidth(double wrappingWidth)
        Sets the wrapping width of the text in pixels. 0 will disable wrapping.
        Parameters:
        wrappingWidth - Wrapping width in pixels

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(double timeout)
        Sets the timeout for the text in seconds. Once display is called, the text will disappear after this time has elapsed. 0 disables timeout.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Time in seconds for the text to be visible.

      • setColor

        public void setColor(javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        Sets the colour of the text
        Parameters:
        color -

        Sets the font of the text
        Parameters:
        font -
